contest-event.event-date:
March 27, 1976 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-third-section
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Test piece awards: 1st: Cliff Bailey Cup and £6 music voucher 2nd: Daily Herald Shield and £3 music voucher 3rd: Semper Fidelis Shield
Own choice march contest also held: 1st: Launceston Town 2nd: Sidmouth Town
April 9, 2012, 6:21 p.m. April 1, 2014, 10:31 a.m.
1 Launceston Town Band B. Luxton
2 Kingsbridge Silver Francis Huxham
3 Sidmouth Town Band R. Hibbs Othello
Unknown Result Okehampton Excelsior Silver Band Reg Beardon
Unknown Result Northlew and Ashbury P. O. Adams
